resources.string: EmerCall Ambulance
Victim
Map
Confirm
Welcome to EmerCall application for ambulances - EmerCall Ambulance
Press Next to continue
Ambulance EmerCall is the second application of EmerCall Real-time Emergency Assistance System, developed for emergency squads on ambulances.
Ambulance EmerCall provides them information about user location, victim status, helping them to approach the site faster and be ready for the case, thus increasing victim survivability.
Map: can be accessed without Emergency State. In Emergency State, this function provides user and ambulance locations.
Victim status: only in Emergency State. This function shows victim information and status provided by the user.
Case confirmation: only in Emergency State. After finishing the transfer, ambulance squad must confirm the status of this transfer.
These 3 functions can be interacted via the navigation bar at the bottom of the screen.
To synchronize with server database, pleae enter this ambulance ID
When activated, EmerCall system will send, receive, distribute and continuously update user and ambulance locations, thus helping the ambulance to approach the site faster.
Thus, to ensure EmerCall performance, please authorize Location Permission for this application.
To authorize, press AUTHORIZE LOCATION PERMISSION button below. A message will appear, asking the user for confirmation. Press Allow to confirm.
After successfully authorizing Location Permission, press Next to continue.
Basic guide completed
EmerCall Ambulance initiating...
Emergency Case Confirmation
Please confirm the result of previous emergency transfer:
After completing the previous emergency transfer, press Confirm to begin this process:
